bug.author: ijrsvt
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h3>What is the problem?</denchmark-h>
The following error message is printed repeatedly when using the autoscaler. It appears many times during ray up ... <denchmark-code>bash: cannot set terminal process group (-1): Inappropriate ioctl for device bash: no job control in this shell </denchmark-code>
Ray version and other system information (Python version, TensorFlow version, OS): <denchmark-h:h3>Reproduction (REQUIRED)</denchmark-h>
Please provide a script that can be run to reproduce the issue. The script should have no external library dependencies (i.e., use fake or mock data / environments): If we cannot run your script, we cannot fix your issue.
I have verified my script runs in a clean environment and reproduces the issue. I have verified the issue also occurs with the latest wheels.
